EDUCATION
Tan Binh Secondary School
· 1998 to 2002
Nguyen Thai Binh High School
· 2002 to 2005
University of Finance - Marketing
April 4, 2011
The Degree of Associate in Economic Information System
Department.
Institue of Accounting and Business Management
·Sep 9,2012
Certificate of the taxation.
Accademy of Finance
April 6,2016
Certificate of general accounting
University of economic Ho Chi Minh City
oFeb 2, 2015
Completed the Certificate of the chief accountant course.
July 19, 2019
Certificate in Chief Financial Offer Course
The Association of Managers and Administrators, United Kindom
WORK EXPERIENCE
Viet Thang Long Logistic Company Accountant staff
June, 2008 to November 2010
-Made receipt and disbursement of cash, and payment in
advance.
-Made expense and receipt report.
-Executed CIT, VAT, and other tax reports.
-Executed payroll calculation and payment to employees.
-Executed tax reports, and Social insurance reports.
-Went to the bank for payment and withdrawal, and payroll.
-Compared payable accounts with Providers, receivable accounts
with customers.
E M G Education Company General Accountant
Since November. 2010 to February, 2013
-Made receipt and disbursement of cash, and payment in
advance.
-Made expense and receipt report.
-Register PIT code for staff.
-Prepare Social Insurance Report and submit to Social Insurance
office.
-Prepare Labor Register Report and submit to Labor Committee.
-Printout and distribute pay slips.
-Executed tax reports, and Social insurance reports.
-Executed CIT, VAT, PIT, and other tax reports.
-Follow-up vendor contract, update vendor list.
-Receipt for tuition fee.
-Input and Output VAT into tax system.
-Executed income report, tax report.
TRUONG
VU KHANH
LY
ACCOUNTING
Parkland Residential & Commercial Complex Co., LTD General
Accountant
Since March. 2013 to May, 2016
-Update move in-move out, collect money from tenant and
membership by cash.
-Prepared and Issue statement of account to tenant, payment
notification to tenant and Membership end of the month.
-Prepared and issue invoice, prepared VAT output and input
report.
-Prepared payable voucher, payment voucher and payment
order.
-Post Payable voucher to sun system software.
-Allocated all receivable account - Print Aging report by sun
system.
-Making Planning cash.
-Amortization Unearned Revenue, membership revenue.
-Amortization, accrued, reverse accrued re-rental fee.
-Prepared statistic report for Government.
-Prepared Summary Fixed Assets report
-Prepared P&L by month.
-Prepared PIT,CIT report
-Prepare file audit report ready for audit at the end of the year
-Prepared audit schedule and inventory schedule for year end
-Assist to Chief Accountant if any requirement.
SAIGON STAR BUSINESS BRIDGE CORPORATION Chief
accountant.
Since June. 2016 untill now
Responsible for the transparency and accuracy of accounting
data.
Organizing the implementation of accounting Procedure and
operations to meet annual audit work.
Building a system of accounting books and vouchers, receipts
and expenditures strictly according to accounting standards.
Establish accounting processes and forms to ensure the
profession is suitable for the business development of the
company and in accordance with the provisions of the relevant
agencies.
Optimization cashflow by controlling sources of debt, revenue
and expenditure.
Analyzing financial situation, balancing capital sources.
Monitor the Company's investment capital.
Make payment plan for suppliers.
-
Responsible for approving the payment incurred.
Provide necessary information for the board of directors in
making short-term, long-term decisions, such as financial
decisions, capital budgeting, project financing ...
Checking and controlling tax reports and tax finalization
reports.
- Work directly with the bank on short term and long term loan
options.
Prepare reports for foreign Loans and payment of foreign
debts.
Prepare management reports as required.
Control all activities in the accounting department.
Working, explaining tax audit data ...
Organizing periodic inventory of units' assets.
Checking the preservation and archiving of accounting
documents strictly according to the state and internal
regulations.
Joined and explained tax finalization for the company about
2009-2012 and 2013-2016.
SKILLS
V
High professional level in the field of accounting - auditing - finance.
 Management, control, evaluation, analysis skills.
Proficient use of financial management software, financial analysis, .
V
Ability to use software: Misa, Sunsystem, Lac Viet, SAP
VC
Good communication skill.
V
Passion, quality of sharp thinking, dedication to the job ..
 High sense of responsibility, under pressure of work.
